Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndi m’gawo lina la usiku, uzimupembedza Iye ndipo uzimulemekeza Iye usiku wonse
Ndithudi! Awa amakonda kwambiri moyo wa msanga msanga wa masiku ano, ndipo amaiwala tsiku limenelidzakhalalovuta
Ndifeamenetidawalengandipo tinaika mphamvu m’ziwalo zawo. Koma ngati Ife titafuna, tikhoza kulenga anthu ena kuti alowe m’malo mwawo
Ndithudi! Ili ndi chenjezo motero aliyense amene afuna, mulekeni kuti atsatire njira yoyenera yopita kwa Ambuye wake
Koma inu simudzatha kutero pokhapokha ndi chifuniro cha Mulungu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndiye Mwini kudziwa ndi Mwini nzeru
Iye adzaonetsa chisomo chake kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Koma anthu ochimwa, Iye wawakonzera iwo chilango chowawa
Pali mphepo imene imatsatana pafupipafupi
Pali mphepo ya mkuntho
Pali mphepo imene imamwaza mitambo ndi mvula
Pali mavesi amene amasiyanitsa chabwino
Pali angelo amene amabweretsa chivumbulutso kwa Atumwi
Kuthetsa kukangana kapena kuwachenjeza
Ndithudi zonse zimene mwalonjezedwa zidzachitika
Pamene nyenyezi zidetsedwa
Ndi pamene thambo la kumwamba ling’ambika pakati
Ndi pamene mapiri aphwanyika kukhala fumbi
Ndi pamene Atumwi onse asonkhanitsidwa kukhala pamalo amodzi
Kodi ndi tsiku liti limene izi zidzachitike
Lidzakhala tsiku la chiweruzo
Kodi ndi chiyani chidzakudziwitse zatsiku la chiweruzo
Tsoka pa tsiku limeneli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
Kodi Ife sitinaononge anthu a makedzana
Kotero tidzaipanga mibadwo yotsatira kuti ione zomwezo
Mmenemu ndi mmene timakhaulitsira anthu ochita zoipa
Tsoka pa tsikuli kwa anthu osakhulupirira
